issue.title: Use Keyboard Controls When Studying
issue.body:
It would be preferred if a user can also use keyboard controls when they study.

EX.  Space would be equivalent to flipping a card
EX.  1= Easy , 2 = Hard

issue.title: Implemented simple Crypto with bcrypt, work factor of 10
issue.body: Our passwords are not in plain text anymore! We know have Blowfish encryption thanks to [`BCrypt-nodejs`](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9035855/is-bcrypt-used-for-hashing-or-encryption-a-bit-of-confusion)
